name: Yami Yami no Mi
description: The Yami Yami no Mi is a Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create and control darkness, as well as the unique ability to nullify the powers of other Devil Fruit users.
weaknesses: Cannot become intangible like other Logia users
history: This fruit is currently used by Marshall D. Teach, also known as Blackbeard.
